name: nice, a hole!
description:
In this sequel to the award-lacking "oh no, a hole." a lonely rectangle discovers that he is no longer allergic to holes. How exciting. Controls Keyboard/Controller

 - movement - A/D or Left Analog Stick

- jump - Space or A (hold to charge)

- dash - Shift or B (when acquired)

Fullscreen Recommended 

Please note that the embed build may have trouble fully functioning on Mac, so we recommend downloading it instead.

Also, downloadable builds may not be up to date with the embed. Be weary of softlocks.

Praise for "oh no, a hole."

"Sometimes the simple games are the best games. This is one of those games!"

-  jocolloman

"As someone who is also allergic to holes, this game touched me emotionally." 

- drdrub
